content: Learn how to create perfect forms and increase your chance to get approval in our <1>guide</1>.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a guide introduction encouraging users to learn how to create perfect forms and increase their approval chances in a form gallery submission process. It appears in a modal dialog body, likely as part of an in-app tutorial or guidance prompt.

usage.context:
{t("FormGallery:SubmitToGalleryDialogMainInfo")}
Learn how to create perfect forms and increase your chance to get approval in our

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tag <1> is not correctly rendered in the Arabic translation. It appears as <1> instead of being integrated into the text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the tag <1> is properly incorporated into the Arabic text, likely using a special character or formatting to represent it as intended in the English source.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tag `<1>` is present in both the English and Azerbaijani content. It's a formatting tag and should be verified for consistent application by the localization team.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the `<1>` tag is applied correctly in the final delivered content. Confirm its purpose and functionality within the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag <1> is present in both the English and German text. This should be verified and potentially adjusted based on the intended purpose. While consistent, it's important to ensure it's handled correctly in the UI.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Confirm the purpose of the <1> tag and ensure consistent handling in the UI/rendering engine.  If it is for highlighting, ensure the highlighting style is appropriate for the German language and target audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tag '<1>guide</1>' is not translated in the Finnish version. It should ideally be translated or replaced with a relevant Finnish term, or the tag itself could be retained if maintaining the original English reference is desired.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating '<1>guide</1>' to a Finnish equivalent (e.g., 'oppaasta', 'ohjeesta') or retaining the tag if the English term is intended.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are not consistently applied between the English and Japanese versions. The English uses `<1>guide</1>` while the Japanese uses `<1>ガイド</1>.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent formatting of HTML tags. Either use `<1>guide</1>` in Japanese or adjust the English to match the Japanese `<1>ガイド</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "increase your chance to get approval" is not accurately reflected in the Korean translation. "승인 가능성을 높이는 방법" literally translates to "methods to increase the possibility of approval," which is a more complex phrasing than the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more direct translation like "승인받을 가능성을 높이는 방법을 알아보세요." (Learn how to increase your chances of getting approved.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The `<1>guide</1>` tag is retained in the Korean translation. This suggests a formatting issue where the tag wasn't properly handled or rendered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the `<1>guide</1>` tag from the Korean translation. It should simply be "guide" or an equivalent Korean term.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tag <1> is not properly closed in the Lao translation. It should be `<1>ຄູ່​ມື</1>`.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the closing tag matches the opening tag: `<1>ຄູ່​ມື</1>`

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content uses angle brackets `<1>guide</1>` to indicate a specific term. This formatting is not consistently applied in the Latvian translation. It should be `<1>guide</1>.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change the Latvian translation to: "Mūsu <1>guide</1> uzziniet, kā izveidot ideālas formas un palielināt iespēju saņemt apstiprinājumu."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'guide' was not translated. It should be translated to Portuguese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aprenda como criar formulários perfeitos e aumente suas chances de obter aprovação em nosso <1>guia</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tag `<1>` is not properly closed in the Romanian translation. It should be `</1>`.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the closing tag `</1>` is present and correctly placed after "ghidul".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation uses `<1>...</1>` tags, mirroring the English source. This is likely an artifact of the translation process and should be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the `<1>...</1>` tags from the Sinhala text.  The text should be: අපගේ මාර්ගෝපදේශයෙන් කදිම ආකෘතිපත්‍ර සාදන ආකාරය සහ අනුමැතිය ලබන අවස්ථා වැඩි කර ගන්නේ කෙසේදැයි දැන ගන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tag `<1>` is not translated or adapted in the Slovak version. It should be handled consistently with the English version, likely by using a similar tag or leaving it untranslated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider adapting the tag or leaving it as `<1>` in the Slovak version to maintain consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'guide' is untranslated. It should be translated to Slovenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Naučite se ustvariti popolne oblike in povečajte svojo možnost, da dobite odobritev v našem <1>vodniku</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'increase your chance to get approval' is not accurately translated. 'Şansınızı nasıl artıracağınızı' literally translates to 'how to increase your chance,' but it's a bit awkward in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'onay alma olasılığınızı artırmayı' (to increase your approval probability) or 'onay alma şansınızı yükseltmeyi' (to elevate your approval chance).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to: '<1>guide</1> mükemmel formlar oluşturmayı ve onay alma olasılığınızı artırmayı öğrenin.' or '<1>guide</1> mükemmel formlar oluşturmayı ve onay alma şansınızı yükseltmeyi öğrenin.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tags `<1>guide</1>` are present in both the English and Turkish text, which suggests they are meant to be preserved for formatting purposes. Ensure these tags are used consistently and correctly in the application where this text is displayed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify the correct application of the `<1>guide</1>` tags in the rendering environment.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag <1>guide</1> is present in both the English and Ukrainian texts, indicating it should be maintained. This appears to be a placeholder for a specific type of link or emphasis. Confirm the intended purpose and styling of this tag.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify the HTML tag's intended purpose and ensure it is correctly applied in the Ukrainian version, maintaining the same formatting and functionality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "guide" is left in English. It should be translated to Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tìm hiểu cách tạo các biểu mẫu hoàn hảo và tăng cơ hội nhận được sự chấp thuận trong <1>hướng dẫn</1> của chúng tôi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The angle brackets (<1> guide </1>) are not consistently formatted. The English uses <1> guide </1>, while the Chinese uses <1>指南</1>. The tag should be consistent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change `<1>指南</1>` to `<1>guide</1>`

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “完备的表单” translates to 'complete forms', which isn't a direct or ideal translation of 'perfect forms'. 'Perfect forms' implies high quality, well-designed, and effective forms. '完备的' focuses on completeness. While not incorrect, it loses nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like '高质量的表单' (high-quality forms) or '精美的表单' (beautiful/refined forms).
